X.i.6.A.1.b
.
Who May File a Pre-Discharge Claim
Any service member on active duty may file a pre-discharge claim.Â  This includes
reservists serving on active duty in an Active Guard Reserve (AGR) role under
10 U.S.C.
full-time National Guard members serving in an AGR role under
32 U.S.C.
, and
service members undergoing medical evaluation board or physical evaluation board proceedings who are not currently enrolled in the IDES program.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section A - Introduction to Pre-Discharge Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section A
